name: gramps
description: Gramps is a self-hosted genealogy software that manages family relationships, events, and documents. It supports reporting, charts, media attachments, and offers both desktop apps and web deployments.
features: Family Tree Management: Build and maintain detailed family trees with relationships, events, and sources.
Report Generation: Create family history reports, charts, and books in various formats.
Media Attachments: Attach photos, documents, and audio recordings to people and events.
Research Tools: Track sources, citations, and research notes for genealogical accuracy.
Timeline Views: Visualize family history with interactive timelines and relationship charts.
Data Import/Export: Exchange data with other genealogy software using GEDCOM format.
Web Publishing: Generate static websites from your family tree for online sharing.
Cross-Platform: Available as desktop application and web deployment for flexible access.
